alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 10:56PM CDT until May 31 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Logan County in west central Nebraska... Eastern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1055 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Ringgold to 7 miles north of Dickens, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Hershey, Arnold, Brady, Maxwell, Gandy, Ringgold, Lake Maloney, Keith, Logan, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Hoagland, Brown Lake and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 206 and 250. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 26. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 161 and 201. Highway 83 between mile markers 71 and 127. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
